clusters.name: Execution
clusters.description: Make plans real: containers, anti-procrastination mechanics, sequencing, and shipping under imperfect conditions.

clusters.name: Systems
clusters.description: Operating systems for your life and business: templates, checklists, decision trees, and maintenance cadences.

clusters.name: Discipline
clusters.description: Consistent action without self-hate: habit scaffolding, relapse-proofing, and friction engineering.

clusters.name: Identity
clusters.description: Self-concept that supports execution: confidence, boundaries, fear, and rewiring the story you act from.

clusters.name: Leverage
clusters.description: Compounding advantage: delegation, automation, writing, distribution, and systems that scale impact.

clusters.name: Executive Operating System
clusters.description: Time blocks, meeting hygiene, weekly planning, and the repeatable routines that keep an exec calendar sane.

clusters.name: Wealth
clusters.description: Money systems: offers, pricing, compounding habits, and practical strategy for earning and keeping.

clusters.name: Accountability
clusters.description: Keeping promises to yourself: tracking, review loops, and honest feedback without spiraling.

clusters.name: Systems & Decisions
clusters.description: Decision quality: frameworks, tradeoffs, risk management, and how to pick the 'right' next move fast.

clusters.name: Burnout & Recovery
clusters.description: Protect energy and rebuild capacity: boundaries, recovery protocols, and sustainable performance.
